relation: El Paso Community College provides a lot of plays and interesting presentations in its theather for all those that are interested in whats going on.
El Paso Community Collage has a very clean and very professional cooks in the kitchen not to mention the Subway restuarant that is in campus.
The classes are not easy at all you have to really study and be ready to learn to be able to be successful in college.
Take notes, use the available resources like the labs for math and writing which provide a great amount of help when in need.
El Paso Community College is a great place to start. Everything is very well organized and makes it easy for students to be able to interact with the instructors.
pageTitle: El Paso Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {349923=There is a student union which hosts different events. Once that just passed was a fall festival for october. Then sometimes they have concerts., 337003=Make sure the counselors give you an actual degree plan. Don't let them look at your transcripts (if you are a transfer) and then just say you need to take certain classes. Make sure they sit down with you and give you an actual plan that you can follow. They didn't do that with me and I was planning on graduating in the Fall of 2013 so I could transfer to another state with an associates, and come to find out they were giving me the wrong classes towards my degree. I spoke with a counselor and was told I was still 5 classes short. I never saw the same counselor twice, so I was getting conflicting information all the time., 409672=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: Julie from El Paso, TX 08/03/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 6 out of 6 people found this review useful. 2 of 104 Categories Comments Am enjoying being here I really like the atmosphere here the teachers are nice aswell as the students. The classroom is very small in which I like because you can actually have one and one time with the teacher! Login to rate or flag the reviews Cecilia from El Paso, TX 03/19/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 4 out of 4 people found this review useful. 3 of 104 Categories Comments Campus Safety The College has its own police department which is always rounding around the college parking and buildings.
